reviewText: wanted to see more sampling and tour of river.
Although the info is timeless, the video is not! Gold mining technology has advanced by leaps and bounds. This video  falls short of providing up to date info about subject.
Good video to watch with some good details on the title subject, would recommend this video, priced right for the material in this DVD.
To Expensive for what little info and stoneage Graphics. I got the same info from books for a quarter the price.

This is a a must have DVD for the beginner prospector!  It provides an in depth review of gold, how it's recovered and demonstrates a variety of wet and dry methods of recovery.  When I first stared this I watched this over and over.  I still pull "nuggets' of information from it

This is one of the biggest wastes of money I have been suckered into for a long time. Save your money and do some research on the internet, instead. This production is a joke! A couple of good tips on where to find gold in rivers, but that's all. Like I said, internet research is preferable to this DVD!
